items.sentence: Tom says he\'s concerned about Mary\'s health.
Tom used to love Mary, but that was years ago.
Tom wanted to fire Mary, but John stopped him.
Tom said he wanted to do that, but he didn\'t.
Drinking warm milk will help you get to sleep.
Tom clearly didn\'t intend to let that happen.

Tom wanted to play tennis yesterday afternoon.
Tom wanted to spend Christmas with his family.
Tom spends all his time thinking about sports.
